wikipedia_page.main: Robert 'Robbie' Robinson (October 1879 – 1951) was a footballer who played for Liverpool in the early 20th century, helping them to the national championship title.

response: *Robbie Robinson (footballer) (1879–c. 1951), English footballer of the early 1900s
*Robbie Robinson, keyboardist and musical director for The Four Seasons
*Robbie Robinson (rugby union) (born 1989), New Zealand rugby union player
